animals.name: Mantis Shrimp
animals.description: The mantis shrimp can punch with the speed of a .22 caliber bulletâ€”strong enough to break the shells of its prey, as well as aquarium glass.

animals.name: Gibbon
animals.description: Gibbons communicate by singing! Gibbon vocalizations are often referred to as song because of the way they modulate their pitch. Gibbons sing alone and in duets and they start each day by singing at sunrise.

animals.name: Penguin
animals.description: A group of aquatic flightless birds.
